title: Summer Splash Cosplay Contest, Sponsored by Logitech

replies.body: Hey are we able to enter with multiple entries of different cosplays? :)
Why would you host a summer-themed cosplay even when it's still snowing?
Hi! Can I enter as a group, and also as an individual entry? Thanks!
Hey Moshx, sorry for the slow reply - that will be totally fine, go for it! :D
thanks for the response! i was also wondering if it's alright to enter the same costumes for the individual and group entries?
What's funny is that I would only ever want to be third place-- How do you even make yourself place third because you have the things first and second place wins.... >.>

Are we able to modify previous cosplays to enter this competition?
Thanks
Hey, that's totally fine. :D Can't wait to see your work!
